Start earning Aeroplan with ShipTime today!


Convert yor rebate credits to Aeroplan Miles
Aeroplan miles can be redeemed for more than just shipment. They can be redeem for vacations, hostels, giftcard, and other merchandise.
No waiting period of one year like with rebate credits! With Aeroplan miles, you have the freedom to redeem then as soon as they're available in your Aeroplan account
Aeroplan miles can be earned from many different retailers. If you have your ete on certain reward, you can earn miles faster with the addition of ShipTime
